channel.title: [PI] Report Abuse..?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone had a link to a tutorial on how to add a fully working Report Abuse system on PI (actually using the red 'Report Abuse' button) If not, can someone make one? :3 I just want it to make a text document with who reported who, why, and when, and if at all possible the last 20-30 lines of text, if not a link to a chat log tut that works would be amazing :3
Thanks bunches if you help : D

item.title: [PI] Report Abuse..?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

This is actually a good idea.
Would actually be better as a command.
Unfortunately, people would troll.
It would be nice to make a text document that the reports go to.

::report (report here)

Example: ::report Dclawkiller19 is spamming at home.

This would result in that report going to a text document in the server files.
I will actually work on this and get back to you .

Read full topic
